Housing system

Housing will be a key feature in personalising the PT experience. Players will be able to buy a plot where a house can be constructed or buy an existing house. The house will function as a private meeting area aswell as a place for the player to express their personal taste for decoration and in-house architecture.


The housing system is related to the Political system. The political entity called house will be able to buy/sell Houses to use as a headquarters. This option is solely available for Minor Houses ( political ). The Major Houses will have set buildings in each respective region.


In the past players will be able to purchase set homes. These homes can be purchased from other players or through the Realestate agent. It is not possible to build on a plot in the past. There will however be enough available pre-set homes to buy.

Buying a house - Past

To buy a house in the past a player needs to be of a certain rank/level as well posess a certain wealth. Houses can be purchsed at the realestate manager in each respective region.


Realestate manager

The realestate manager is a NPC that manages the housing data in a certain region. The player will be able to select one of the folowing options when talking to the Realestate manager:


- Buy

The player will see either an image or description of the realestate for sale. The info displayed will contain detailed information about the size of the building and the capacity of players that can settle in. The price will also be displayed.


The player can select to buy the piece of realeststate. When this option is selected a confirmation message will appear to confirm the purchase. When the player meets sufficient requirements to complete the purchase he will receive the Deed to the building. When the player does not have the required items to complete the transaction a message notifying them of their shortcomings should be displayed.


- Auction

The player gets to see a menu with realestate that has been put up for auction. This section is for now player-only until further discussion has occurred on the subject. The realestate put up for auction will initially display a starting bid. After other players place a bid ( minimum increments must be set ) the expiration date of the auction will be set. The auction will be automated but players can choose between different time limits to set for their auction. Players can only bid if they have the necessary wealth in hand. When their bid is in effect they cannot spend this "money" until the auction is over. Once the auction is finished the player with he highest bid will receive the deed to the building.

Buying a house - Future

Buying a house in the future is often as "simple" as purchasing the materials needed, bringing them to the location, and building (using personal skills or hired PCs or NPCs). The cost of such an endevour can vary wildly, and can be significantly complicated by resistance from other characters.
